Conjecture: Real-world events will tend to have multiple causes

Scenarios where a single variable completely explains some event are probably very rare

2024-11-11

Prediction: HTML/JS/CSS will be the first and last human-leveraged language of the internet

By the time we could feasibly rebuild the internet from the ground up, AI will be doing most of the coding anyways.

2024-09-03

High-Frequency Events in Human History

How much of human development was serendipitous?

2024-05-09

Leaving Comments

To leave a comment on a particular post: make a pull request, add a file with format `{timestamp}-{github username}.md` in the `comments/` folder of a particular post -- and eventually it'll appear on the next build.

Or just email it to me ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
